export default function TicketList({ tickets }) { return (

Lista Tickete

{tickets.length > 0 ? (
{tickets.map((ticket) => ( ))}
ID Titlu Incident Prioritate Status Data Start
{ticket.id} {ticket.incident_title} {ticket.priority_name} {ticket.status} {ticket.start_date ? new Date(ticket.start_date).toLocaleDateString("ro-RO") : "-"}
) : (

Nu existÄƒ tickete pentru filtrele selectate.

)}
); }
